body:
Added GNUPLOT package :
- [X] support for `readline`, `cairo`, `pango` and other optional libraries
- [X] variant to activate the wxWidgets terminal
- [X] patch to fix build of `ncurses` when compiling with `gcc@5.0:` (I think the issue is similar to #149, and that was not solved for me under Ubuntu)

Build tested manually (with and without `wx`):
- Ubuntu 14.04
- RHLE 6

Missing in this PR:
- variant to support `qt` terminal (it seems I have troubles wit `mesa`, and I guess it could take some time to fix those)
title: gnuplot : added package
